CustomField.description: SUMS up the TRUE values in the Events history section for the past 3 fiscal years, giving one point for each fiscal year the person attended an event.
CustomField.formula: IF((Last_Year_Event__c == TRUE),1,0) + IF((Two_Years_Ago_Event__c == TRUE),1,0) + IF((Three_Years_Ago_Event__c == TRUE),1,0)
CustomField.inlineHelpText: SUMS up the TRUE values in the Events history section for the past 3 fiscal years, giving one point for each fiscal year the person attended an event.
CustomField.label: Events Last 3 Years Score
